thread.title: Watch Donald Trump malfunction as he talks about uranium
thread.title_full: Watch Donald Trump malfunction as he talks about uranium

title: Watch Donald Trump malfunction as he talks about uranium
text:
Watch Donald Trump malfunction as he talks about uranium Uranium is, you know, nuclear weapons and other bad things or something. Close Donald Trump slams media coverage in lengthy press conference Reuters 
Donald Trump is most comfortable in press conferences having a go at the media for reporting "fake news" . 
You know, fake news like his erstwhile national security adviser Michael Flynn's dodgy conversations with Russian officials about lifting the Crimea sanctions. 
On other topics? Not so much. He haughtily asked the question to reporters: "You know what uranium is, right?" 
And then quickly realised he had no idea himself, and the circuitry under his definitely-not-a-hairpiece started fizzing and smoking, and he was just left repeating the word "things". 
"You know what uranium is, right? It's this thing called nuclear weapons. And other things, like lots of things are done with uranium, including some bad things." 
It's painful to watch, but please do. 
Do you even uranium, bro? More from IBTimes UK
